product_name: One Ball Jay Viper Paste Wax
long_description: An excellent choice for quick applications, the One Ball Jay Viper Paste wax goes on easy to keep you moving fast. Paste wax includes a large sponge applicator for spreading wax onto the base of your skis or snowboard. Paste is highly fluorinated for maximum performance in high humidity or wet snow.
short_description: An excellent choice for quick applications, the One Ball Jay Viper Paste wax goes on easy to keep you moving fast.
